name: Bust Cat Bubble 18
description:
Bust Cat Bubble 18 is the most classic and addictive bubble shoot and bubble match-three game.
Aim and shoot! Bounce and Pop! Use your skills to size up the perfect shot and popping streaks to activate special pops with powerball. Try to burst as many as bubbles as you can in this exciting bubble shooting puzzle saga!
- Shoot bubbles and blast your way up through the clouds!
- Bubbles are spinning: Precise aiming and bouncing off the walls are a must!
- Explore 900+ challenging levels
- Prove your skills in hundreds of challenging levels
- Easy to play, but a challenge to master
